From: Mohd Al Khadouri <Mohd.AlKhadouri@maf.ae> 
Sent: Tuesday, September 24, 2024 10:58 AM
To: Guess MuscatCityCenter <Guess.MuscatCityCenter@chalhoub.com>; Salwa Al Mamari <Salwa.Almamari@chalhoub.com>; Rim Dayoub <Rim.Dayoub@loccitane.me>; Kawttar Nassik <Kawttar.Nassik@chalhoub.com>; L'Occitane En Provence Muscat City Center <loccitane.muscatcitycenter@loccitane.me>; Randa Escondose <Randa.Escondose@loccitane.me>
Cc: Ragesh Manjapurath <Ragesh.Manjapurath@maf.ae>; Said Mohamed Al Rawahi <said.alrawahi@maf.ae>; Rashad Al Balushi <Rashad.AlBalushi@maf.ae>; Abdullah Al Hadhrami <Abdullah.AlHadhrami@maf.ae>; Sumaiya Amur Al Musallami <Sumaiya.Musallami@maf.ae>
Subject: Urgent: Required Store Insurance Renewal L'Occitane at CCM

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Tenants,

 

I hope this message finds you well. This is an important notice regarding the insurance of your store.

It has come to our attention that the insurance for your store has expired. As per the rental agreement, trading cannot continue without valid insurance. This clause is critical for maintaining health and safety standards within our premises.

chunks.text:
This clause is critical for maintaining health and safety standards within our premises.

We kindly request you to renew your insurance as soon as possible. Please provide us with the updated insurance documents by the deadline of 29th September 2024. Failure to provide these documents by the deadline may result in a penalty, as outlined in the rental agreement.

Thank you for your immediate attention to this matter and for your understanding.

 

Best Regards,

 

 

Mohd Al Khadouri
Operations Executive
Mall Operations

MAJID AL FUTTAIM PROPERTIES LLC
Muscat, Oman
T +968 2 407 0700 / Ext: 6121
Mohd.AlKhadouri@maf.ae <mailto:Mohd.AlKhadouri@maf.ae>
